As a gay man, I think it’s important to listen to the perspectives of the protestors because drag queen story hours do give off major grooming vibes and are weird af at best. Instead of respecting the protestors right to free speech, you called the cops on them for exercising their rights. How is that standing with all LGBTQIA2SWTF people?

This is another meaningless virtue signal just like a drag queen reading a story to a child is in the first place. Gay people are not clowns. You don’t need to desensitize children to our existence by exposing them to the lowest level of gay nightlife culture. 

It’s also notable that @LAPDHQ took action against protestors at a drag queen story hour, but did nothing as they watched ANTIFA members surround me and illegally detain me for a half hour during the “Trans Day of Vengeance” on March 31.
